content: I think I'll take some more time to think about it and do some more research. I want to make sure I find the perfect piece that complements my grandmother's necklace and holds a special meaning for me. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I also need to get my engagement ring resized. Do you think I should take it to the same place I plan to take my pearl earrings, or should I find a separate jeweler who specializes in ring resizing?
